response.job_title: CEO, Transportation and Road Safety Consultant.
response.summary: Civil engineer, bilingual Spanish, handling of AutoCAD, GIS, office and PmBok, with knowledge in management, innovation, entrepreneurship, data analysis, evaluation and project structuring; with experience in management, strategic planning and supervision of infrastructure projects, with skills in analysis, assertive communication, results orientation, decision making and negotiation skills.
response.skills: especializacion en transito, diseño y seguridad vial, Civil Engineering, Transportation Engineering, Highways, Traffic Engineering, Road, Transportation Planning, AutoCAD, Drainage, Engineering, Stormwater Management, Project Planning, GIS, ArcGIS, Gestión de proyectos, Análisis, Sostenibilidad, Desarrollo sostenible, Liderazgo de equipos, Microsoft Office

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the strategic management of the company, including legal representation. Accountable to shareholders for the operational and organizational performance. Manages business relationships with clients and banks. Projects economic results and oversees the operating budget, monitoring and control.

Additionally, responsible for marketing products and services related to the company's business lines. Presents public and private tenders.
profile_positions.title: CEO and Founder

profile_positions.description: Transport advisor for territorial planning plans developed towards sustainable transport, design of traffic management plans, project management, technical and economic evaluation of projects, and road safety advisor.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

company.name: Asociación de ingenieros para servicios S.A.S.

profile_positions.company: Asociación de ingenieros para servicios S.A.S.
profile_positions.description:
Functions: Manager in charge of the operational, financial and market functions to improve the company's productivity indexes seeking to generate new businesses and strengthening existing ones, monitoring indicators and creation of company policies.

Achievements: I increased sales by 10% and decreased operating costs by 12% based on the immediately prior year.
profile_positions.title: CEO and Founder

profile_positions.description:
Functions: As the Coordinator, I have been responsible for overseeing a public-private partnership road spanning 200 km. My role includes conducting studies and designing initiatives aimed at reducing accidents along the corridor. Additionally, I have been in charge of implementing an integrated road safety management system (ISO 39001) and conducting road safety audits.

Achievements: I am proud to highlight my accomplishments in improving road safety. Through the implementation of various measures, I successfully reduced the number of deaths and serious injuries along the corridor by 25% compared to the previous year. Furthermore, within the same timeframe, I achieved a remarkable 60% reduction in road crashes involving the company's own fleet.
profile_positions.title: Road safety coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Functions: As a professional providing support to the technical assistant of Transmilenio S.A., my role involved the revision of routes, stops, intervals, supply, demand, and requirements of the entity. I focused on optimizing the Integrated Public Transport System of Bogotá (SITP).

Achievements: I am proud to have achieved significant improvements in the transport system. Specifically, I successfully facilitated the change of at least 8 routes in the neighborhoods of Fontibón, Engativá, Barrios Unidos, and Teusaquillo. These changes were implemented to ensure the mobility of citizens in Bogotá. As a result of these adjustments, we were able to improve the fleet's occupancy rate by 10%, enhancing the efficiency of the transport system.
profile_positions.title: Infrastructure professional

profile_positions.description:
Functions: As a consultant, my role involved programming resources and budgets using Primavera P6 software. I also provided risk analysis and civil advice for the closure of cooling towers in Barranca's refinery.

Achievements: I am pleased to report that all four cooling towers were successfully completed according to the project plan, with no deviations in terms of time or budget. The project was executed efficiently and effectively, ensuring the smooth closure of the cooling towers in Barranca's refinery.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

education.degree_name: Specialist in traffic, design and road safety

company.name: BONA INGENIEROS
company.description:
Somos una empresa dedicada al desarrollo de la ingeniería y sus áreas relacionadas, que entrega soluciones innovadoras mediante un grupo humano altamente calificado.

We are a company dedicated to the advancement of Engineering and all related fields. We provide innovative solutions through a highly qualified group.
